doc:
William Boyd (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Boyd_(actor) 0 William Lawrence Boyd (June 5, 1895 – September 12, 1972) was an American film actor who is best known for portraying the cowboy hero Hopalong Cassidy. William_Lawrence_Boyd ( June_5_,_1895 – September_12_,_1972 ) was an_American_film_actor who is_best_known for portraying the_cowboy_hero_Hopalong_Cassidy .
